text: Dale White (born 17 March 1968) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Peterborough United F.C. players Category:Gateshead F.C. players Category:Wollongong Wolves FC players Category:English Football League players
title: Dale White
